actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily reduce the duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.

titles.title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.
